short_description: A modern Islamic productivity app that helps Muslims stay consistent with salah, ibadah, and spiritual habits — clean, minimal, and syncs beautifully across devices.
current_features: Custom reminders for salah, fasting, adhkar
Google Auth and user profile sync
Minimal UI with Framer Motion animations

functionality_help: Integration with Notion or Google Calendar

why_it_matters: There are millions of Muslims seeking spiritual consistency, but most Islamic apps are either outdated or noisy. Deenly offers a focused, modern solution built for the mindful Muslim who wants to track salah, build ibadah habits, and grow spiritually — all without clutter.
fun_fact: Built and shipped this project solo while working full-time as a frontend engineer
status: Active — MVP live, looking for collaborators to expand features and polish the experience.
